Interface EpochConfigurable

All Superinterfaces:
HyperparameterConfigurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
EpochRegime
public interface EpochConfigurable extends HyperparameterConfigurable
Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    HP_EPOCHS
    The hyperparameter key name for epochs.

    Method

    getEpochs()

    Sets the number of training epochs.

  • Method Details

    • getEpochs

      default int getEpochs()
      Returns the configured number of training epochs.
      Returns:
      the number of epochs (must be ≥ 1)

    • setEpochs

      default void setEpochs(int epochs)
      Sets the number of training epochs.
      Parameters:
      epochs - the number of epochs (must be ≥ 1)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if epochs < 1
